text: Cubana de Aviación Flight 972 (CU972/CUB972) was a scheduled domestic flight from Havana to Holguín, Cuba, on May 18, 2018. The Boeing 737-200 flying the route crashed shortly after takeoff, bursting into flames near Santiago de las Vegas, from Havana city centre. Of those onboard, 108 died and 3 survived with critical injuries. and one of them died hours later at the hospital. Cuban President Miguel Diaz-Canel stated that a special commission had been formed to find the cause of the crash. ==References== Category:2018 in North America Category:2010s in Cuba Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2018 Category:May 2018 events
title: Cubana de Aviación Flight 972
